sources.title: Eegah
sources.description: A caveman is discovered out in the desert who proceeds to fall in love with a girl and then wreak havoc on a nearby town. You can find out more about this film on its IMDB page .

sources.title: Eegah
sources.description: From IMDb : While driving through the desert, a teenage girl is frightened by a seven-foot giant which appears in her path. After escaping, she returns to the site with her boyfriend and her father in an attempt to find the giant. They do, and it proceeds to terrorize them and the rest of Palm Springs, California. Stars: Arch Hall Jr., Marilyn Manning, Richard Kiel, and Arch Hall Sr. The 1GB MPEG4 file was derived from the 2GB MPEG2 found on this page .

sources.title: Eegah
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

Director: Nicholas Merriwether (aka Arch Hall Sr.)

A prehistoric caveman emerges from the desert and becomes infatuated with a ravishing teenage girl, leading to a bizarre clash of ancient and modern worlds. This cult classic blends campy thrills, teenage romance, and unforgettable musical numbers in a low-budget adventure that's truly one of a kind.

Get ready for a wild ride into the world of "Eegah," a legendary Drive-in Schlockrocker that embodies the best of cult classics, grindhouse thrills, and trashcan cinema! sources.title: Eegah! (1962) Arch Hall Jr., Marilyn Manning, Richard Kiel | Full Adventure Movie
sources.description:
The Crazed Love of a Prehistoric Giant for a Ravishing Teenage Girl!  Love Breaks the Time Barrier!
Teenagers stumble across a prehistoric caveman, who goes on a rampage & terrorizes them and the rest of Palm Springs, California.

Original title: Eegah (1962) AKA: Eegah! The Name Written in Blood

Director: Arch Hall Sr.
Writers: Bob Wehling, Arch Hall Sr.
Stars: Arch Hall Jr., Arch Hall Sr., Marilyn Manning, Richard Kiel
Genres:  Adventure, Comedy, Cult, Fantasy, Horror, Music
Budget: $15,000

metadata.Plot: While driving through the desert, a teenage girl is frightened by a seven-foot giant which appears in her path. After escaping, she returns to the site with her boyfriend and her father in an attempt to find the giant. They do, and it proceeds to terrorize them and the rest of Palm Springs, California.
metadata.Actors: Arch Hall Jr., Marilyn Manning, Richard Kiel
